title: New:
message:
New:
* ObjectService: Provides caching of known Activity Objects
* ObjectActivity: An activity which shows an Activity Object! Woo! At last!
* CommentAdapter: Used for displaying comment threads
Changes:
 * FeedService will now watch the main feeds of all of your accounts in the background
 * Extracted some common Accuount information out into ActivityWithAccount
Added dependency:
* DiskLRUCache. Also licensed under Apache 2.0
Bump version:
 * v0.2.1

title: Make the authentication flow cleaner. Remember the last account used.
message: Make the authentication flow cleaner. Remember the last account used.

title: Bump version code
message: Bump version code

title: Add custom account type. Make feed service able to check multiple feeds.
message:
Add custom account type. Make feed service able to check multiple feeds.

Notifications are gone, but are coming back.

For now, check just the major activity inbox

title: On older (e.g. ICS) versions of Android, the view gets wrapped in such a way to…
message: On older (e.g. ICS) versions of Android, the view gets wrapped in such a way to break onClick handler registration. Work around that by not using onClick handlers.

title: The update count is now cleared whenever you swipe away the notification or click it
message: The update count is now cleared whenever you swipe away the notification or click it

title: Impeller, say hello to the world!
message: Impeller, say hello to the world!
